scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run wrangler-dev" "doppler run --command='npx next dev'"
scripts.wrangler-dev: doppler run --command='wrangler dev --config ./worker/wrangler.toml  --var GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID:$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID --var SENTRY_BACKEND_DSN:$SENTRY_BACKEND_DSN --var GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET:$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET --var SENTRY_RELEASE:$SENTRY_RELEASE --var SENTRY_ENVIRONMENT:$SENTRY_ENVIRONMENT --port 8787 --local --host localhost:3000 ./worker/src/index.js'
scripts.wrangler-staging: wrangler dev --port 8787 --local --host localhost:3000 ./worker/src/index.js --var GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID:$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID --var SENTRY_BACKEND_DSN:$SENTRY_BACKEND_DSN --var GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET:$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET --var SENTRY_RELEASE:$SENTRY_RELEASE --var SENTRY_ENVIRONMENT:staging
scripts.deploy: concurrently "npx wrangler pages publish out --commit-dirty=true --project-name=bem" "npx wrangler publish ./worker/src/index.js --config ./worker/wrangler.toml --var GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID:$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID --var GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET:$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET --var SENTRY_BACKEND_DSN:$SENTRY_BACKEND_DSN --var SENTRY_RELEASE:$SENTRY_RELEASE --var SENTRY_ENVIRONMENT:$SENTRY_ENVIRONMENT "
